feature.label: Run Jetty Run Feature
feature.description: This feature packages the run-jetty-run plugin. This Eclipse plugin is a simplification of JettyLauncher (http://jettylauncher.sourceforge.net/), which at this time is not maintained anymore. This initiative aims to be simple but effective, with a recent version of Jetty shipped with the plugin, so that you can run your projects without further configuration.
